terms: **AMENDED AND SUBSTITUTE TERM LOAN A NOTE**
**AMENDED AND SUBSTITUTE TERM LOAN B NOTE**
**FOUR MILLION NINE HUNDRED SIXTY-TWO THOUSAND FOUR HUNDRED SIX AND 01/100 DOLLARS ($[[USD Value 2]])**
**FOUR MILLION THREE HUNDRED THIRTY THOUSAND EIGHT HUNDRED TWENTY-SEVEN AND 07/100 DOLLARS ($[[USD Value 3]])**

**THIS REVOLVING NOTE HAS BEEN DELIVERED AT AND SHALL BE DEEMED TO HAVE BEEN MADE AT NEW YORK CITY, NEW YORK AND SHALL BE INTERPRETED AND THE RIGHTS AND LIABILITIES OF THE PARTIES HERETO SHALL BE DETERMINED IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE INTERNAL LAWS AND DECISIONS OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK WITHOUT REGARD TO CONFLICTS OF LAW PROVISIONS.**

**THIS TERM NOTE HAS BEEN DELIVERED AT AND SHALL BE DEEMED TO HAVE BEEN MADE AT NEW YORK CITY, NEW YORK AND SHALL BE INTERPRETED AND THE RIGHTS AND LIABILITIES OF THE PARTIES HERETO SHALL BE DETERMINED IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE INTERNAL LAWS AND DECISIONS OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK WITHOUT REGARD TO CONFLICTS OF LAW PROVISIONS.**
**TWO MILLION SEVEN HUNDRED SIX THOUSAND SEVEN HUNDRED SIXTY-SIX AND 92/100 DOLLARS ($[[USD Value 1]])**
